form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Medical Clearance Requirements for Aliens Seeking Adjustment of Status

full_text: LOW 1-883 (HEA Screened by NARA, 7/13/2023 Medical Clearance Requirements 202 for Aliens Seeking Adjustment of Status SOIO Medical Estimated Time Action Condition For Clearance Required Suspected 5 - 30 Days The applicant must provide to a civil surgeon a psychological or Mental psychlatric evaluation from a specialist or medical facility for final Conditions classification and clearance.
